Central Hawke’s Bay: Driver who hit cattle beast on highway taken to hospital by helicopter https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/central-hawkes-bay-driver-who-hit-cattle-beast-on-highway-taken-to-hospital-by-helicopter/ WKSLGOUMNVEO7GBNB34RY3U7DE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/central-hawkes-bay-driver-who-hit-cattle-beast-on-highway-taken-to-hospital-by-helicopter/ WKSLGOUMNVEO7GBNB34RY3U7DE/ A police spokeswoman said there were reports of stock on the road at the time. Mon, 27 May 2024 19:45:18 +0000 Police were called to SH2 near the intersection with Argyll Rd near Waipawa at 3.07am.

Have your say: Submissions to close on Māori wards bill https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/have-your-say-submissions-to-close-on-maori-wards-bill/XPGZX3XVDBAUFIBOWEQNKVLGSU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/have-your-say-submissions-to-close-on-maori-wards-bill/XPGZX3XVDBAUFIBOWEQNKVLGSU/ The public have until tomorrow to have their say on council bill.Mon, 27 May 2024 18:39:12 +0000 The previous government abolished the requirement for referendums resulting in Aotearoa going from three councils with Māori wards to 49. Photo / Alisha Evans
